FuncDef: The display ospf router-id conflict command displays information about router ID conflicts (if any). The display ospf router-id conflict command displays information about router ID conflicts (if any).

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an OSPF process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo: If router ID conflicts exist on the network and are not resolved automatically, route flapping may occur. To check information about router ID conflicts (if any), run the display ospf router-id conflict command. The command output helps with the check on incorrect configurations.
